## ThemeVisitor.visitStyles() method

Applies a function to every style in the theme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
visitStyles(visitFunc: (style: StyleDeclaration) => boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  visitFunc | (style: [StyleDeclaration](./harp-datasource-protocol.styledeclaration.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; boolean | Function to be called with <code>style</code> as an argument. Function should return <code>true</code> to cancel visitation. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if function has finished prematurely.
